alert.note: Alert for Boyle; Casey; Fayette; Garrard; Jessamine; Larue; Lincoln; Madison; Marion; Mercer; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 10:27AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CST/230 PM EST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of EAST CENTRAL Kentucky, NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky and south central Kentucky, including the following counties, in EAST CENTRAL Kentucky, Boyle, Clark, Fayette, Garrard, Jessamine, Madison and Mercer. In NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Larue, Nelson and Washington. In SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Casey, Grayson, Green, Hart, Lincoln, Marion and Taylor. In south central Kentucky, Adair, Barren, Edmonson and Metcalfe. * WHEN...Until 130 PM CST /230 PM EST/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 927 AM CST /1027 AM EST/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Richmond, Liberty, Nicholasville, Winchester, Danville, Glasgow, Campbellsville, Harrodsburg, Lebanon and Stanford. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Boyle; Casey; Fayette; Garrard; Jessamine; Larue; Lincoln; Madison; Marion; Mercer; Nelson
